main event: A civilian observed a brilliant colored object in the sky over Mekoryuk, Alaska, which disappeared after 2 hours of observation.
interesting points: The object was compared to an electric light bulb and turned bright red before disappearing behind clouds., The sighting was consistent with previous balloon observations reported in Japan., No trail or exhaust vapor was noted during the sighting., The object was reported to be larger than a match stick, about the size of a light bulb., A hand-drawn sketch was included, showing the object's shape and direction of movement.
witness description: a civilian who observed the object for two hours
